actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude income derived from certain wagers on horse races from the gross income of a nonresident alien individual.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from "gross income" income derived by a nonresident alien individual from a legal wagering transaction initiated outside the United States in a parimutuel pool with respect to a live horse race in the United States.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude income derived from certain wagers on horse races from the gross income of a nonresident alien individual.
